title: Driven
content: We are a group of highly motivated MU students, all working to help Miami Engineering be the best that it can be.

title: Imagine
content: Miami's students are doing amazing things in the field of research, and Miami University want to see their work to shine and inspire others to go beyond their limits.

title: Unite
content: Within just the past semester alone, MEC has become a well-known organization within the school and has brought students together in a way that has never been done before.
